Lesson 26 - WAP

Expected Work

  1. Continue working on your MVC triads
  2. Finished CRUD models for each one of your tables
  3. Go through your feature list and implement each through an API perspective, don't worry about the presentation, just the data
  4. Incorporated third party login, if necessary

Agile

  1. What did you since last session
  2. What do you want to achieve today
  3. Any problems?

Lecture

  1. Concurrent processing
  2. Sockets and RTC - WAMP + Ratchet
  3. SOLID OOP Pattern
  4. 30 days left!

Practice

  1. Keep refactoring your code as you write it
  2. Be strict and disciplined with your RESTful routing
  3. Think hard about what is a resource and what are the child resources and how you can interact with them
  4. Try to make your application dynamic with full database integration so that you begin polishing
